speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( 2007/2286(INI) ) ( A6-0013/2008 ) by Mr Corbett and Mr Méndez de Vigo, on behalf of the Committee on Constitutional Affairs, on the Treaty of Lisbon.
